TestDescription.name: WordPress W3 Total Cache plugin predictable cache filenames
TestDescription.Description: WordPress plugin W3 Total Cache has a security issue that can occur if using database caching to disk. When database caching to disk with a web server with directory listing or web accessible wp-content/w3tc/dbcache/* directories an attacker can predict the names of cache files and retrieve their contents.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to W3 Total Cache version 0.9.2.5 or later.

Reference.database: WordPress Remote Exploit - W3 Total Cache
